About.paragraph: At the heart of the University of Basel, our association proudly stands as a hub for celebrating Albanian culture, fostering a strong sense of community, and providing unwavering support to our members. Our initiatives encompass a broad spectrum of events, ranging from vibrant cultural festivals to enlightening educational seminars, all contributing to the vibrant tapestry of the university experience

Features.title: Announcements
Features.text: We are a collective of students and professionals dedicated to giving back to our community
Features.textt: The Albanian Student Association fosters cultural unity among Albanian students

Features.title: Updates
Features.text: Our goal is to support our community by offering help in studies, careers, and by generating opportunities!

Features.title: Gatherings
Features.text: The association brings everyone together for memorable gatherings. We collaborate with volunteers and professionals to provide everyone with the support they require.
